src/dds/peer/content_filtered_topic_impl.hpp

00001 #ifndef AC_SIMD_DDS_CONTENT_FILTERED_TOPIC_IMPL_HPP
00002 #define AC_SIMD_DDS_CONTENT_FILTERED_TOPIC_IMPL_HPP
00003 
00004 #include <vector>
00005 
00006 #include <dds/topic.hpp>
00007 #include <dds/peer/runtime_impl.hpp>
00008 
00009 namespace dds {
00010   namespace peer {
00011     template <typename T>
00012     class ContentFilteredTopicImpl;
00013   }
00014 }
00015 
00016 template <typename T>
00017 class dds::peer::ContentFilteredTopicImpl {
00018 public:
00026   ContentFilteredTopicImpl(const std::string& name,
00027                            const dds::Topic<T>& t,
00028                            const std::string& filter,
00029                            const std::vector<std::string>& params)
00030 
00031     : name_(name),
00032       topic_(t),
00033       filter_(filter),
00034       params_(params),
00035       dp_(dds::peer::RuntimeImpl::instance().get_participant())
00036   {
00037     DDS::StringSeq paramSeq;  
00038     paramSeq.length(params_.size() + 1);
00039     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < params_.size(); ++i) {
00040       paramSeq[i] = DDS::string_dup(params_[i].c_str());
00041     }
00042     // As per the OpenSplice DDS docs there seems to be the need for n+1 args.
00043     // thus we fill the (n+1)th within SimD.
00044     paramSeq[params_.size()] = DDS::string_dup("");
00045     
00046     cft_ = 
00047       dp_->create_contentfilteredtopic(name_.c_str(),
00048                                        topic_->get_dds_topic(),
00049                                        filter_.c_str(),
00050                                        paramSeq);
00051 
00052     dds::Assert::postcondition(cft_ != 0,
00053                                "Unable to create ContentFilteredTopic",
00054                                 __FILE__); 
00055   }
00056 
00057   ~ContentFilteredTopicImpl() {
00058     dp_->delete_contentfilteredtopic(cft_);
00059   }
00060 
00066   std::string
00067   get_filter_expression() const {
00068     return filter_;
00069   }
00070 
00076   std::vector<std::string>
00077   get_expression_parameters() const {
00078     return params_;
00079   }
00080 
00086   void
00087   set_expression_parameters(const std::vector<std::string>& params) {
00088     params_ = params;
00089     DDS::StringSeq paramSeq;
00090     paramSeq.length(params_.size());
00091     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < params_.size(); ++i)
00092       paramSeq[i] = DDS::string_dup(params_[i].c_str());
00093     cft_->set_expression_parameters(paramSeq);
00094   }
00095 
00101   dds::Topic<T>
00102   get_related_topic() const {
00103     return topic_;
00104   }
00106   // -- Methods inherited from Topic Description
00107   virtual std::string
00108   get_name() const {
00109     return name_;
00110   }
00111   
00112   virtual std::string
00113   get_type_name() const {
00114     return cft_->get_type_name();
00115   }
00116   
00117   virtual dds::DomainParticipant
00118   get_participant() const {
00119     return dp_;
00120   }
00121 
00122 public:
00123   TopicQos get_qos() const {
00124     return topic_.get_qos();
00125   }
00126   
00127   DDS::ReturnCode_t set_qos(const TopicQos& qos) {
00128     return topic_.set_qos(qos);
00129   }
00130   
00131 public:
00139   DDS::ContentFilteredTopic*
00140   get_dds_topic() const {
00141     return cft_;
00142   }
00143   
00144 private:
00145   std::string name_;
00146   dds::Topic<T> topic_;
00147   std::string filter_;
00148   std::vector<std::string> params_;
00149   DDS::ContentFilteredTopic* cft_;
00150   dds::DomainParticipant dp_;
00151 };
